metadataAttributes.Title: Business Foundations Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Solve Real Business Problems. Build a foundation of core business skills in marketing, finance, accounting and operations.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Positioning (Marketing), Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Customer Satisfaction, Financial Accounting, Accounting, Financial Statement, Balance Sheet, Decision-Making, Change Management, Human Resources (HR), Discounted Cash Flow,
